descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
You have **only five days** before the final exam, and your chances of passing are slim. After months of hanging around and wasting time, you finally decide to do the right thing: **break into the school** and **steal the exam paper**. 📜

But **Willy Walee School** is far more dangerous at night. The guard, **Mr. Funny**, has one job: **catch anyone trying to cheat**. He can hear you when you **drop something** on the floor, and every mistake will land you in the **lock-up for 24 hours**. ⏰

**Sneak through the school**, solve puzzles, and avoid detection as you break into the Director’s office to steal the exam paper from the safe.

 **Game Controls:** 🎮

1. **Thumbstick**: Move around and rotate  
2. **Upper Buttons**: Crouch/Uncrouch  
3. **Lower Buttons**: Adjust your height  

The game is based on **solving puzzles**. The items are **randomly rearranged** each time you start a new game, offering endless possibilities and **high replayability**. 🔄

It also features **physics-based interactions**, so if you enjoy **picking up items**, **opening doors**, and interacting with the environment, this game is for you. 🏫

You can play while **standing or seated**, and you can always adjust your height with one click. Since the game contains multiple features, the gameplay might take a little while to get used to. 🔧

**Gameplay time** is around **20-60 mins** each round, offering a fun way to **boost memory**, sharpen reflexes, solve puzzles, and stay cool under pressure. 🧠⚡
